ValidationRule.description: Makes the Subsidy Type Required if there is a value in the Subsidy Amount field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( CONTAINS(Product_Type__c, "Discount"), ISBLANK(Subsidy_Amount__c), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Subsidy_Type__c))) ), AND( CONTAINS(Product_Type__c, "Discount"), NOT(ISBLANK(Subsidy_Amount__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Subsidy_Type__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Subsidy Type is required when there is a Subsidy Amount, and Subsidy Amount is required when there is a Subsidy Type selected.
